thread.title: BRIEF-Facebook Says Its Messenger Feature Does Not Collect The Content Of Calls Or Text Messages

title: BRIEF-Facebook Says Its Messenger Feature Does Not Collect The Content Of Calls Or Text Messages
text: March 25, 2018 / 7:44 PM / Updated 24 minutes ago BRIEF-Facebook Says Its Messenger Feature Does Not Collect The Content Of Calls Or Text Messages Reuters Staff March 25 (Reuters) - Facebook Inc: * FACEBOOK SAYS ITS MESSENGER FEATURE DOES NOT COLLECT THE CONTENT OF CALLS OR TEXT MESSAGES * FACEBOOK SAYS INFORMATION IN ITS MESSENGER FEATURE IS SECURELY STORED AND "WE DO NOT SELL THIS INFORMATION TO THIRD PARTIES"‍​ Source text: bit.ly/2pEYqaF Further company coverage:
